metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5382 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
program/steps/addressbook/photo.inc in Roundcube Webmail before 1.0.6 and 1.1.x before 1.1.2 allows remote authenticated users to read arbitrary files via the _alt parameter when uploading a vCard.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5382` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-core - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-mysql - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-plugins - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: msalvatore> It may not be safe to backport upstream's patch for trusty as it may break functionality.

criterions.comment: roundcube package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1').
